World.Name: Victoria
World.Entry:
December, 1050: Victoria understands the difference between friendly and hostile animals January, 1051: Victoria can track the animals in the area February, 1051: Victoria is in Animal Empathy Training and practicing existing skills March, 1051: Victoria can call a pet cat April, 1051: Victoria: Hi Nora Nora: Hi Victoria! Mum sent me to tell you to do some chores around the farm instead of just relaxing all the time. If you want though, we could sneak off and go play instead! Victoria: I'll think on it - you always were a bad influence on me Nora: Hey - that's what sisters are for!
April, 1051: Victoria does nothing all month
